mapper.insert: insert into review(content, score, User_id, Res_id) values(#{review.content}, #{review.score}, #{review.User_id}, #{review.Res_id})
mapper.update: update restaurant , (select res_id, avg(score) as score_avg from review group by Res_id) as rev set restaurant.res_score = rev.score_avg where restaurant.res_id = rev.res_id
